student_projects.title: IKanji
student_projects.description: IKanji is a web app that enhances the learning of Japanese Kanji. It allows users to create custom lessons or use existing ones from the Genki Textbook that can be studied with IKanji's flashcards and multiple choice features. Additionally, it integrates AI to further enhance the educational experience.

student_projects.title: Auto Note
student_projects.description: AutoNote is a web app that helps users quickly create summarized notes from PDF files. Using React for the frontend and Express for the backend, it allows users to upload files, generate Markdown summaries with OpenAI's API, and manage their notes securely with Firebase. The app features a simple, user-friendly interface for uploading, viewing, downloading, and deleting notes.
